title: How to Make a Good Place on ROBLOX

steps.headline: Click on "Create" and "Edit" for the place you want to edit.
Insert a part.
steps.description: Click it once. Go to the left upper of your screen and find 'View' -> 'Properties'.

steps.headline: Find the property 'Anchored' in part when properties are found.
steps.description: Make it true. Make the top-surface 'Smooth' and the bottom-surface 'Smooth'.

steps.headline: Go to left upper of your screen.
Find the 'Blockmesh'.
steps.description: Insert it into the brick you selected.

steps.headline: Resize the part, recolor it, and build anything you want.
steps.description: Be sure to use all properties including transparency, reflection , etc.

steps.headline: Make a round-system if it's a fighting game.
steps.description: If it's a tycoon, be sure to make it work, and make enough tycoons. If it's an obby, be sure not to use too many colors. Only use tints of blue, green and brown. Red will make players mad when they can't win. Blue and green keeps them calm. If it's a minigame kind of game, make sure it works, and that you don't have to wait too long. If it's a disaster game, make sure the disasters are hard enough, and they don't have to wait too long for every disaster. If it's another kind of game, make something to do. A lot of hangout places on Roblox don't have any activities to do there.

steps.headline: Add badges for some of the challenging things.

text:
Click on "Create" and "Edit" for the place you want to edit.  Open Roblox Studio.  Insert a part. Click it once. Go to the left upper of your screen and find 'View' -> 'Properties'. Find the property 'Anchored' in part when properties are found. Make it true. Make the top-surface 'Smooth' and the bottom-surface 'Smooth'. Click the part once again.  Go to left upper of your screen. Find 'Insert' -> 'Object'. Find the 'Blockmesh'. Insert it into the brick you selected. Resize the part, recolor it, and build anything you want. Be sure to use all properties including transparency, reflection , etc. Make a round-system if it's a fighting game. If it's a tycoon, be sure to make it work, and make enough tycoons. If it's an obby, be sure not to use too many colors. Only use tints of blue, green and brown. Red will make players mad when they can't win. Blue and green keeps them calm. If it's a minigame kind of game, make sure it works, and that you don't have to wait too long. If it's a disaster game, make sure the disasters are hard enough, and they don't have to wait too long for every disaster. If it's another kind of game, make something to do. A lot of hangout places on Roblox don't have any activities to do there. Add badges for some of the challenging things. Users will try to get a badge that's worth it. A 'You Played' badge is okay too. It advertises your own game on other peoples' profiles. Some ideas for badges include:
Welcome! 15 Minutes
20 Minutes
30 Minutes
1 Hour
Winner (if your level is an obby)
VIP
Mega VIP

You must have Builders Club in order to make and upload badges to Roblox. Make sure your game doesn't break or lag a lot!  Do not overuse free models! Three or more free models are too much. It'll just make your place really slow or may cause lag. Advertise your place for a lot of money. It's just investing in your place, not just throwing away money. Try playing the game with your friends. This will attract more people. Learn to build your own models and/or script. It will make your game more original and unique.
